item.description:
Enneagram Basic Workshop
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types in depth, what core type you are, personal growth for each type and how to relate to all 9 types. Herb acts out the 9 types with props and hats. Lots of fun and insight about your personality.


7:30 pm - 10 pm

Cost: $40 - Sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, has taught a number of workshops on assertiveness and living your authentic life. He is a leading expert in the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), is a therapist for individuals, couples, and families who specializes in enhancing relationship satisfaction through understanding personality differences. He does phone sessions and leads trainings for groups, organizations and companies.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
